weather_overview: Currently, the weather is overcast with a temperature of 9°C and a real feel of 6°C. The wind is blowing at a speed of 7 meters per second with gusts up to 10 meters per second, coming from the northwest. The air pressure is at 1006 hPa, and the humidity is quite high at 89%. The dew point is at 7°C, and the visibility is at 10,000 meters. The UV index is at 0, and the sky is covered with 95% clouds. Overall, it's a cool and breezy evening with overcast clouds, so make sure to bundle up if you're heading out.
